alston.minecraft

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • alston.minecraft.Utility

  • public class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains utility functions that can be applicable in multiple situations, or is to be used by multiple classes. All the methods in this class are public and static and Objects are public and final. Note that these methods are synchronized, and therefore thread-safe.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.Comparator ARRAY_LIST_COMPARATOR
      A Comparator that will sort/search a Matrix-ArrayList of Comparable Objects.

      • round

        public static float round(float unrounded)
        Rounds a given float to 3 significant digits.
        Parameters:
        unrounded - The unrounded value of the float
        Returns:
        The float rounded to 3 significant digits

      • craft

        public static void craft(SlotArea craftingSpace,
         SlotArea craftingResult)
        Checks on the crafting space if it's currently a recipe for an Item. If it is, places the new Item in the craftingResult.
        Parameters:
        craftingSpace - The SlotArea of any size with the ingredients to be crafted
        craftingResult - The SlotArea of size 1x1 where the result will be placed

      • setLightLevel

        public static void setLightLevel(com.jme3.scene.Spatial spatial,
                 float lightLevel)
        Sets the verticies of the given Spatial if it's a Geometry to the given lightLevel.
        Parameters:
        spatial - The Spatial to set the vertice's light levels
        lightLevel - The light lebvel to set it at

      • getBlock

        public static Block getBlock(float x,
             float y,
             float z)
        Gets the Block from the given 3D co-ordinate space location.
        Parameters:
        x - The x component
        y - The y component
        z - The z component

      • getCollidedPictures

        public static java.util.Iterator<com.jme3.collision.CollisionResult> getCollidedPictures(com.jme3.scene.Node node)
        Casts a ray to the guiNode to find the collided pictures and returns an iterator for it.
        Parameters:
        node - The node where the pictures belong to
        Returns:
        An iterator containing all the collided Pictures

      • give

        public static void give(Player player,
        int type,
        int amount)
        Gives the player a specific item (used for cheating/testing).
        Parameters:
        player - The player to give the Item to
        type - The item type
        amount - The amount of items
